originalText.text: I have used the app for year. In the last year they no longer give credit for referrals, won't let you cash out your rewards and won't answer support tickets. Yet they still send out stacks. So it's apparent they are still making money but not honoring the agreement with this making them the money. Run away!

originalText.text: This app used to work and you ever fairly rewarded for surveys. But as other people are saying, it has stopped being able to cash out and I have thousands of points unable to be redeemed. Contacted support several times and they are unresponsive. It is now a scam as surveys keeps coming in but there is no way to cash out and the app is gone from the App Store

originalText.text:
Super shady company. I completed a “stack” (their word for survey) over a month and a half ago, which promised a gift card payout in addition to the usual points, since it was a more involved survey. I had to take numerous videos recordings of myself, the survey took about 30 minutes if not more), and I never received the gift card. I contacted them over the following weeks both in the app and through their contact form online, with no word after 5 contacts. I then looked up the company online, and seeing the negative reviews I tried cashing out my points and was unable to, just as other reviewers have said. This is no way to run a market research platform, and it’s appalling that this scammy company has mainstream, high-profile clients (if their website is to believed, which at this point maybe it shouldn’t be)
UPDATE: I messaged in-app that I was going to report them to the FTC (which I did); a few hours later I got the Amazon gift card I was promised in my email. Still can’t cash out my points though.

originalText.text: I am beyond upset with this app! I have been trying to cash out since Early September. This app use to work as I have cashed out three times prior. However, now every time I try it tells me something went wrong! I sent a message on the app as well as several emails and they have never gotten back to me.

originalText.text:
I am beyond upset with this app! I have been trying to cash out since September 27,2022. Every time I try it tells me something went wrong! I sent a message on the app no response.
What ever is wrong needs to be fixed asap. Is Perksy now a scam. Fix it and my review will change! If not better business will be notified for fraud!
